event.title: 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Molina spans

data.event: According to the 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Molina spans an area of 1,551.6 km2 (599 sq mi) and has 38,521 inhabitants (19,392 men and 19,129 women).
The population grew by 8% (2,847 persons) between the 1992 and 2002 censuses.

event.title: is directly elected every four years

data.event: As a commune, Molina is a third-level administrative division of Chile administered by a municipal council, headed by an alcalde who is directly elected every four years.
